title: What can I do if I can't use the flash?
answer:
l   Set the flash mode to mandatory ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144624719001.jpg). The flash will always turn on when you are taking a photo or shooting a video.

l   If the flash mode is set to auto ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144624576002.jpg), the camera will turn on or off the flash based on the ambient light. If you want to turn on the flash in a bright environment, enable mandatory flash mode.

l   If the flash can't turn on in mandatory mode, check whether your phone has sufficient battery.

Your phone automatically disables power-intensive functions, such as flash, when the battery level is low.

Charge your phone if necessary.

l   The flash may not turn on if your phone is overheated or the flash is too frequently used. Wait for a while and try again.
